title: Arsenic in Bangladeshi rice like in Sri Lanka
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana Scientists have identified a variety of aromatic rice in Bangladesh with a very low arsenic content compared with non-aromatic rice. The work has been published in Biomedical Spectroscopy and Imaging. Vast populations in Bangladesh are exposed to arsenic through drinking water and rice, the staple food, grown in soil and water…
